name: Dodge Ball (WillCatoProductions)
description: This game is called Dodge ball its on multiplayer the Player 1 is red and Player 2 is green is like versing each other like Red Versus Green when the red ball appears grab it by using the letter keys like A S W and D when your health is getting low when the green player hits you with a green ball get the health pick up when it appears if you lose all your health the green the green player wins the game if you hit the green player with the red ball the green player health gets low when the green player health runs out if you hit the green player you win so your the red player if the other is person is playing with you just having fun playing with each other good luck
